text: mannarame samuha miniwala yayi kiyawena sthanayehi sa.tho.sa. godanagillak pihita thibunada kalin koti sanwidhanayata sambandha athuru sanwidhanayaka karyalayaki.

monaragala okkampitiya pradeshaye kirthimath gowi parapurakin pawatha ena monaragala disthrik hitapu parlimenthu manthri jayasundara wijekon mahatha nawarathna em.bi. wijekon mahathage piyage ekakusa upan wadimahal sahodarayaku wana athara siya maw parshawaye gnyathin athara di.em. banda mahatha hewath usgamayawe aarachchi mahatha, muppane saranathissa nayaka himipanan, menma wellasse mahakalu sinhalaya lesin wirudawaliya lath pasu kaleka grama niladhari warayaku wu hinbanda disanayaka aarachchi mahatha yana aya piliwelin siya mawage piya saha wadimahal sahodarayan depalak wanneya.
athi wishishtayi sar!

sariputhraya, eya hariyata kaluwara pakshayehi di chandrayage kisiyam rathriyak ho dawalak ho gatha we nam chandraya warnayen mandalayen aalokayen digu pululin pirihennak meniyi wadala (sariyuth hamuduruwan prakasha kala karunu ma yalith ema deshanawa thahawuru karanu was eyama budurajanan wahanseth prakasha kota sariyuth himiyange deshanawa buddha bhashithayak bawata path karamin sariyuth himiyange dharma gnyanaya pasasumata bhawitha kalaha.yalith buduhamuduruwo deshana karanawa sariputhraya, yamaku thula kushala dharma pilibanda shraddhawa nathikama, hiri othap nathikama, wirya nokirima, pragnyawa nathikama, asima sandaha kan yomu nokirima, asu dharmaya sithin dara noganima, asu dharmayehi artha yali yalith parika kota nobalima, nopilipadima, kusal kirimata yuhusuluu noganima, asu dharmayehi artha yali yalith parikshakota nobalima, nopilipadima, kusal kirimata yuhusulu nowima yana siyalu lakshana pudgalayage pirihime lakshanayi.

ohu 1983 sita 1994 dakwa kalaya thula dinaminata diriyak ma wiya. 1957 agosthu palamuwanida dinamina kathumadullata upakathuwarayaku washayen ekwu ohu, wisheshanga karthru dinamina niyojya karthru, dinamina pradhana karthru, upadeshaka wani thanathuruwalata path wiya.in anathuruwa dinamina kathuwaraya bawata pathwanne sarath kure mahatha ya.
eeth lankawe suwanda naha.
